scripts.test: npm run -s _checkNoEsbuild && npm run -s _touchDevLocalEnv && npm run -s _emulPrimed && npm run -s _test1 && npm run -s _test2
scripts._test1: make refresh-vite-dev && PORT=3002 docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml run --rm vite-dev-launched
scripts.dev:local: npm run -s _checkNoEsbuild && npm run -s _touchDevLocalEnv && npm run -s _emulPrimed && make refresh-vite-dev && PORT=3000 docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml run --rm --service-ports vite-dev
scripts._prime: make refresh-prime && docker compose -f docker-compose.tools.local.yml run --rm prime
scripts.dev:online: npm run -s _checkStaging && npm run -s _checkNoEsbuild && npm run -s _touchDevOnlineEnv && make refresh-vite-online && PORT=3001 docker compose -f docker-compose.online.yml run --rm --service-ports vite-online
scripts.build: npm run -s _checkNoEsbuild && npm run -s _checkStaging && npm run -s _touchProdEnv && npm run -s _touchStats && make refresh-build && RELEASE=manual docker compose -f docker-compose.tools.prod.yml run --rm build
scripts._build:dev: npm run -s _touchDevLocalEnv && make refresh-build && docker compose -f docker-compose.local.yml run --rm build
scripts._checkStaging: [ -f ../../firebase.${ENV-staging}.js ] || ( >&2 echo "ERROR: '../../firebase.${ENV-staging}.js' is missing; see root 'README.md' on how to create one.\n"; false)
scripts._checkNoEsbuild: [ ! -d node_modules/esbuild ] || ( >&2 echo "INTERNAL ERROR: 'node_modules/esbuild*' shouldn't be there; please remove them. (rm -rf node_modules/esbuild*)"; false)
scripts.preinstall:
[ ${npm_config_omit:-_} == optional ] || ( echo >&2 "***	Please install with '--omit=optional'. We want to avoid local copies of 'vite', 'esbuild*' and 'rollup').
	This has to do with use of Docker Compose to run Vite.
"; false )
scripts.postinstall: if [ -z $BUILDER_OUTPUT ]; then npm run -s _postinstall_dev ; else npm run -s _postinstall_ci ; fi
scripts._postinstall_dev: (cd node_modules && rm -rf vite rollup esbuild esbuild-*)
